{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=D6300 |revision=v1 |upc=606449086867 |ean= |asin=B009O70C3A |price= |est_release_date=04/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6361 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM6361 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX, NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,, ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''AC1600 WiFi ADSL Modem Router''' [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6300.aspx Product page] (UK) {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=D6300}}
[http://netgear.com/about/press-releases/2012/09172012.aspx Netgear Press release] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnet.com.au/netgear-d6300-339344156.htm Review on '''C|Net'''] (AU) :'''NETGEARXX''' and '''NETGEARXX-5G''' default SSID patterns ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/archive/index.php/t-2631463.html ''Netgear D series'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] :*[[Netgear D6300v2]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6300.aspx AC1600 WiFi DSL Modem Router] ::[[Lantiq]] AR10 (ADSL2+) + [[Lantiq]] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/hardware/soc/soc.lantiq VRX318] (VDSL2) ===See also=== *[[Netgear D6200v2]] - [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6200.aspx AC1200 WiFi DSL Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 (ADSL2+) *[[Netgear D6100]] - [http://www.netgear.co.uk/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D6100.aspx AC1200 WLAN Modem Router] :[[Lantiq]] AR10 (ADSL2+) + [http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/hardware/soc/soc.lantiq VRX368], 128/128MB RAM/ROM :(2x LAN + 1x WAN GbE, N300 + AC867, antenna int. 2 + 2) __NOTOC__
